bibl.title: Locating Ancient Site with the Help of Network Analysis. A Lost Cause?
bibl.note: When sufficient data is available, network analysis can help deduce geographic positions of settlements from analyses of proximity patterns. The more coordinates are left out, the more inaccurate the results become. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Yanne Broux, Locating Ancient Site with the Help of Network Analysis. A Lost Cause?

When sufficient data is available, network analysis can help deduce geographic positions of settlements from analyses of proximity patterns. The more coordinates are left out, the more inaccurate the results become. - Avec résumé en anglais.
